comment: Has no idea what he is doing. We had no syllabus until the second week of classes. Did not reply to emails. Uploaded lecture slides the third week of classes. syllabus does not align with classes. Doesn't even know how to use the homework/textbook program. i try to give grace because he is new with lack of training, but it gets to a point.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Beware of pop quizzes
